orderSwitcher.sortByOldestFirst:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for sorting contributions by oldest first.
**UI Location**: Journey → Contributions List → Sort by dropdown
**When Users See This**: When opening the sort order dropdown on the Contributions list page.
**Technical Context**: Used in a SingleSelect component. Must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Sort by Oldest First"
orderSwitcher.sortByNewestFirst:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for sorting contributions by newest first.
**UI Location**: Journey → Contributions List → Sort by dropdown
**When Users See This**: When opening the sort order dropdown on the Contributions list page.
**Technical Context**: Used in a SingleSelect component. Must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Sort by Newest First"
markAllAsSeenButton.markAllAsSeen:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to initiate marking all contributions as seen.
**UI Location**: Journey → Contributions List (above the list)
**When Users See This**: When there are unseen contributions on the Journey Contributions List page.
**Technical Context**: Button text. Disabled if `unseenTotal` is 0.
**Current English**: "Mark all as seen"
markAllAsSeenModal.markAllAsSeenQuestion:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the 'Mark all as seen' confirmation modal.
**UI Location**: Journey → Contributions List → 'Mark all as seen' modal (modal heading)
**When Users See This**: After clicking the 'Mark all as seen' button.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Mark all as seen?"
markAllAsSeenModal.confirmationMessage:
**Functional Purpose**: Confirmation message for marking all contributions as seen.
**UI Location**: Journey → Contributions List → 'Mark all as seen' modal (modal body)
**When Users See This**: After clicking the 'Mark all as seen' button.
**Technical Context**: Includes `%{unseenTotal}` which must remain unchanged and represents the number of unseen contributions.
**Current English**: "Are you sure you want to mark all {{unseenTotal}} contributions as seen? Note that these contributions may span multiple pages."
markAllAsSeenModal.continue:
**Functional Purpose**: Action button to proceed with marking all contributions as seen.
**UI Location**: Journey → Contributions List → 'Mark all as seen' modal (form button)
**When Users See This**: In the 'Mark all as seen' confirmation modal.
**Technical Context**: Button text for submitting the action.
**Current English**: "Continue"
markAllAsSeenModal.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Action button to dismiss the 'Mark all as seen' confirmation modal.
**UI Location**: Journey → Contributions List → 'Mark all as seen' modal (form button)
**When Users See This**: In the 'Mark all as seen' confirmation modal.
**Technical Context**: Button text for canceling the action.
**Current English**: "Cancel"
